Product Details

Take the party with you
Compact, lightweight and easy to carry – wherever you’re heading, make the SRS-XB23 the first thing you pack. Whether you’re camping with friends or relaxing in the park, the compact and lightweight SRS-XB23 fits into your plans as easily as it fits into your bag.

  • The SRS-XB23 fits perfectly in the cupholder of your camping chair – great for chilling out at open-air festivals
  • Hang your speaker in your tent or on the nearest tree – wherever you want to share your favourite beats
  • The rigid and lightweight Mica Reinforced Cellular (MRC) speaker cone and dust cap contributes to the sound quality. The layout of the side passive radiators has been optimised to reproduce clear bass sound
  • The SRS-XB23 has been designed with convenience in mind, so you can enjoy music when and where you want to, no fuss
  • The speakerphone function offers a convenient way to talk hands-free, whether it’s a conference call for work or a chat with friends
  • Connect up to 100 compatible wireless speakers8 with BLUETOOTH® technology and the music syncs up so everyone dances to the same beat
  • Whether you place it horizontally or vertically the SRS-XB23 sits securely so you can always find space for it, wherever you’re partying. When placing it horizontally, you can switch from monoaural audio playback to stereo audio playback using the Sony Music Center app
  • Use a USB Type-C® cable to charge the SRS-XB23
  • EXTRA BASS™ sound
  • Compact, lightweight and highly portableX-Balanced Speaker Unit for clear, powerful sound
  • Waterproof, dustproof (IP67 rated) and shockproof
  • Up to 12 hours of battery life (EXTRA BASS™: Up to 10 hours)Speaker Type: Full Range
  • Input & Output Terminals: USB-Type-C TM
  • Frequency Transmission Range: 20 Hz - 20,000 Hz (44.1 kHz sampling)

  • Prices are in AUD and inclusive of GST. Prices are subject to change without prior notice and may vary for the same product with different colours
  • EXTRA BASS™ is a trademark of Sony Corporation
  • The unit, with the cap fastened securely, has a waterproof specification of IPX7*1 as specified in “Degree of protection against water immersion” of the IEC60529 “Ingress Protection Rating (IP Code)”, and a dust proof specification of IP6X*2 as specified in “Degrees of protection against solid foreign objects”.*1 IPX7 equivalency: The speaker has been tested to and maintains its operability when gently submersed in water to a depth of 1 m and left for 30 minutes.*2 IP6X equivalency: The speaker has been tested to and continues to block dust after stirring for 8 hours in a testing device which contains dust particles that are up to 75 μm in diameter
  • If the surface of the system gets dirty, do not use detergent, thinner, benzine, alcohol, etc. to clean and do not brush the system. Whether you can completely wash it off or not, depends on the dirt or stain.This does not guarantee no damage, no breakdown, or waterproof and dust proof performance in all conditions
  • Deformation or damage from dropping the system or subjecting it to mechanical shock may cause deterioration of the waterproof and dust proof performance
  • When in STAMINA mode, and the volume is set to approximately half the maximum level. The sound mode and lighting settings require changing from the factory defaults
  • Refer to the Operating Instructions and the Help Guide for how to change the settings
  • Actual performance may vary from the listed time due to the volume, songs played, surrounding temperature, and usage conditions
  • When in EXTRA BASS sound mode (factory defaults), and the volume is set to approximately half the maximum level. Actual performance may vary from the listed time due to the volume, songs played, surrounding temperature, and usage conditions
  • Only compatible between SRS-XB43, SRS-XB33, SRS-XB23. Products compatible with the Wireless Party Chain function are not applicable for connection
  • When watching movies using the Party Connect function, there may be a gap between video and audio
  • This product is also known as SRS-XB23/BC AU, SRS-XB23/CC AU, SRS-XB23/LC AU, SRS-XB23/RC AU
  • Actual colour and dimension may differ from the screen image
  • Colours & features of the product shown may differ by model and country
  • Services availability depends on region
  • A part or whole of software/services installed into or accessible through the product may be changed, discontinued, removed, suspended, or terminated without notice
  • Features and specifications are subject to change without prior notice
